text: “(Iye) adati: “Palibe chikaiko, chilango ndi mkwiyo wochokera kwa Mbuye wanu zakugwerani. Kodi mukukangana nane pa za maina (a mafano) omwe mudawatcha inu ndi makolo anu, pomwe Allah sadatsitse umboni uliwonse pa milungu yanu yabodzayo? Choncho, dikirani. Inenso ndili pamodzi nanu mwa odikira.”
